text: Aryankavu is a village in Kollam district, Kerala, India. The coordinates are . As of the 2001 India census, Arienkavu had a population of 12,125 with 5,949 males and 6,176 females. The Palaruvi Falls is in the forest away from Aryankavu. Rose Mala is a tourism place in Aryankavu away from Aryankavu Junction. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Villages in Kollam district
title: Aryankavu
